input.sentences: i just left work when i came upon a car that flipped over .
it was so close to the cement blockade but it did n't quite reach it .
there was no one in the car | thank goodness | but it looked pretty beat up .
there were other people around besides me to see if the owners needed help .
i left the scene shortly after taking pictures .
output.sentences: which caused the car to turn over
it was really a bad wreck
but turned around and left it
